segments.text: Are you aware that you ran through that stop sign ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How could you not notice it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If there really was a stop sign , I couldn't see it because of the overgrown bushes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know.You ' re right . The bushes are covering the sign .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I saw the stop sign , I would've stopped for it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now that I think about it , I can see how you missed it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Am I getting a ticket for this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll let you off with a warning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , I really do appreciate that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry about it . I need to have something done about those bushes .
segments.speaker: S2
